title: Setting Healthy Boundaries with Your Kids, Part 6
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary:
John and Danny discuss how to stay in control as parents when a child is disobedient despite constant repetition, and it gets tempting to let anger boil over.

Receive the book Boundaries With Kids with your gift of any amount!
